desc: mDiffFitExec loops over a list of image overlaps, computing then fitting the differences.

arguments.name: tblfile
arguments.desc: Table file list of input images.

arguments.name: template
arguments.desc: FITS header file used to define the desired output.

arguments.name: fitfile
arguments.desc: Table file for output difference fit info.

arguments.name: keepAll
arguments.desc: Flag to keep temporary difference images.

arguments.name: levelOnly
arguments.desc: Flag to fit level of differences only, not slopes.

arguments.name: noAreas
arguments.desc: Flag indicating there are no area images.
